column2: an A.M. Eatery////We tried this place in Orange County and again here and it was consistently delicious. Pancakes (esp lemon and sweet potato) were amazing
column3: French toast (OMG) was so rich without being overly sweet
column4: Bennys wereall so savory with great clean flavors. Coffee was perfect (and we're coffee snobs). One small complaint was it was so darn loud at both places. Otherwise
column5: it's our new fave breakfast place.
